title: Create new company profile with essential business information
description: As a sales representative, I want to create a new company profile with essential business details, so that I can start tracking potential customers in the CRM.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I am on the companies page, when I click the 'New Company' button, then I see a company creation form
Given I am on the company creation form, when I enter company name, industry, size, and website, then all fields are validated in real-time
Given I have filled required fields, when I click 'Save', then the company is created and I am redirected to the company profile page
Given I try to create a company with an existing name, when I click 'Save', then I see a warning about potential duplicates

definitionOfDone.item: API endpoint for company creation implemented

definitionOfReady.item: User story is clearly defined with acceptance criteria
